traveller_s_tale.title: Obtain the Sinner
traveller_s_tale.text: Hi, I'm an otherworld mage with the power to manipulate dreams and fantasies... These are my lines, right?

traveller_s_tale.title: Greeting
traveller_s_tale.text: Are you going to join us too, Chief? All right, I will do my best to protect you, even if it's just a game.

traveller_s_tale.title: Ordinary Contact 1
traveller_s_tale.text: It's nice to do something other than following orders once in a while... I guess this is what relaxing means.

traveller_s_tale.title: Ordinary Contact 2
traveller_s_tale.text: In the virtual world, anyone can become the character of their dreams, and do things that they can't do in reality... I guess this is what makes games so alluring.

traveller_s_tale.title: Ordinary Contact 3
traveller_s_tale.text: Nightmare also put on the new gear, it seems to like it a lot.

traveller_s_tale.title: Ordinary Contact 4
traveller_s_tale.text: Mulangrador... Ah... EMP says that to really immerse yourself in the game, you should say the magic skill names out loud.

traveller_s_tale.title: Idle
traveller_s_tale.text: O brave warrior who have come here from afar, accept the guidance of the heavens and stars to embark on a quest for the secret treasure...

traveller_s_tale.title: Special Attention
traveller_s_tale.text: Where do you want to go for the mission, Chief? Just give me the order and I'll come with you.

traveller_s_tale.title: Pat Head
traveller_s_tale.text: Mess told me that this is the gear only a mage gets to have... The bigger the hat, the higher the bonus stats. Want one too, Chief?
